products.ball: name;Ball Mill; overview  Ball mills are used primary for single stage fine grinding regrinding and as the second stage in two stage grinding circuits. The final products size can be reached to 0.074 mm~0.4 mm in diameter. feature[Being able to grind very hard materials and the final products sharp well meet standardThe capacity and fineness can be adjusted by adjusting the diameter of the ball.Stable performance &Easy installationNo pollution for the powder with ceramic ball applicationBall mill is key equipment in mineral ore dressing plants and it is widely used in the cement the silicate product new type building material fire-proof material chemical fertilizer black and non-ferrous metal glass ceramics and other industries.
products.belt: name;Belt Conveyor; overview  Belt conveyors is widely used in various industries. SBM designed the unique belts and belt systems to meet specific end-user requirements for high performance and cost-efficiency especially in the mining and construction industry. feature[High carrying capacity and the length is customizedAnti-skidding design ensure that it works very well even in severe environmentEasy to operate and easy to maintain Different models for choice technical technical applicationBelt conveyor is used for transferring lump materials or manufactured products in quarry mining construction metallurgical industries and other industries.
products.cone: name;Cone Crusher; overview Cone crushers is the mainstream machines used as middle&fine crushing machines in mining&construction industries. To meet clients’ requirements SBM produce series of cone crushers such as CS cone crusher HPC cone crusher HCS cone crusher PY spring cone crusher. feature[Large capacity &High crushing ratioGood final products shape & Excellent performanceDifferent crushing cavities design well meet different requirements &Easy to adjustAutonomic Hydraulic control is optional &Low operating-costs technical applicationCone crushers are used in cement mill mining building construction road &bridge construction railway construction and metallurgy etc. Common mineral&rocks are easily crushed by it.
products.feeder: name;Vibrating Feeder; overview Vibrating Feeder belongs linear-direction feeding equipment. It not only send materials to crusher evenly and continuously but also screen materials roughly increasing the practical handling capacity of the whole production line. feature[Stable performance &Reliable operation.Easy to adjust &Easy to maintainLong span life &No pollution with closed bodyGood performance-conditioning it can be used in any severe environments technical technical applicationVibrating feeders are indispensable equipment in the mining construction road building bridge construction and quarrying recycling aggregates and cement industries etc
products.flotation: name;Flotation Machine; overview Flotation machine is indispensable machine in many mineral dressing plants. Agitator flotation machine pneumatic flotation machine and pneumatic- agitator flotation machine are produced for differents projects. feature[Large air-absorption capacity and low energy consumptionOptimistic structure design & Excellent performanceReasonable circulation of mineral slurryAutomatic control Easy to adjust technical technical applicationFlotation machine are mainly used in mineral ore dressing plants. It is applicable for the separation of numerous of mineral ores such as fluorite and talc gold ore copper ore iron ore and zinc ore etc.
products.hammer: name;Hammer crusher; overview Hammer crusher designed by SBM fits for producing 0-3MM coarse powder products. This machine adopts theories of traditional crushing machines and grinding mills. It makes up the shortage of common mills and it is the best choice to produce coarse powder at big capacity. feature[High production and high crushing ratio.Low power consumption homogeneous particle size.Simple compact and light mechanical structure.Low investment cost easy management.  application Hammer crusher is mainly suitable for crushing soft and medium-hard ore whose compression strength is not higher than 320MPa such as coal salt chalk gypsum blocks limestone glasses and phosphate etc
products.hfscreen: name;High-frequency Screen; overview High-frequency screen is able to damage tension force of the pulp surface. Also the fine particles are able to oscillate speedily on the surface of the screen because of the high frequency and the big expecting minerals are isolated from the pulp easily. feature[Adopt the most advanced theory and new structure.High vibrating frequency leads to high screen efficiency and big capacity.Controlled by computer every exciter specification is adjustable.Low powder consumption technical technical applicationHigh-frequency screen is a good choice for screening and grading the fine particles of mineral ores. Such as iron ore tin ore tungsten ore tantalum ore and dolomite sand etc.
products.hydraulic: name;Hydraulic-driven track mobile plant; overview Hydraulic-driven track mobile plant is another masterwork of SBM. It has tremendous flexibility and compact design one operator can drive it to anywhere directly without any other help. Now it has been widely used in recycling concrete and gravel industries. feature[Excellent mobility &Easy to collocate with other plantsGood passing ability and good adaptability to hilly and marsh areas.Easy and precise to controlled & Travel in a infinite variable speed.Autonomic control &Convenient for transport and maintenance. technical technical applicationHydraulic-driven track mobile plant are used in great many areas that have great requirements of plants’ mobility such as river aggregates processing construction waste recycling road &bridge construction and mining industries and so on.
products.hydrocyclone: name;Hydrocyclone; overview Hydrocyclone is extensively used for closed circuit grinding and classification system  thickening des dewatering  tailings filling damming recovery processes in ferrous nonferrous metal and nonmetal mine industries. feature[High capacity & High classifying efficientEasy to disassembly & Easy to maintainLow investment cost & Taking little spaceSimple structure and there is no moving parts technical technical applicationHydrocyclone has wide application in metal ore and nonmetal ore processing plants such as iron ore dressing manganese ore beneficiation coal processing environmental power and alumina industry.
products.impact: name;Impact Crusher; overview SBM impact crusher involve many models they run through the whole crushing plant the primary crushing secondary crushing and tertiary crushing. With good plant design &combination they are able to meet numerous crushing requirements. feature[Steady performance &High handling capacityEasy to operate and maintain with the autonomic hydraulic deviceDischarging port is adjustable well meet customers’ different business-demandLower noise &Good dustproof design reach to international environment protection standard technical table classdataintable tbodytr td Modeltd td Feed Opening(mm)td td Max Feeding(mm)td td Capacity(th)td tr tr tdPFW1214IItd td1100×1430td td500td td130-200td tr tr tdPFW1315IItd td1200×1530td td600td td180-320td tr tr tdPFW1318IItd td1200×1830td td700td td240-400td tr tr tdPFW1415IItd td1450×1530td td800td td240-450td tr tbodytable applicationImpact crushers well fit for crushing numerous medium and soft mineral &rock materials such as limestone feldspar calcite talc barite clay tombar thite kaolin gypsum and graphite etc.
products.jaw: name;jaw crusher; overview Jaw crushers are mostly used in primary crushing crushing raw stones&rocks to small ones. It can also used in tertiary crushing it depends on the models. SBM design& produce series of jaw crusher and they well meet customers’ different requirements. feature[High crushing ratio &Big capacityStable performance & Even final productsOutput size is adjustable & Equipped with autonomic adjustment-deviceEasy to operate & Convenient to maintain technical table classdataintable tbodytr tdModeltd td Feed Opening (mm)td td Discharge Opening (mm)td td Capacity (th)td tr tr tdPE200×350td td200×350td td20-50td td2-6td tr tr tdPE250×400td td250×400td td20-60td td5-20td tr tr tdPE250×750td td250×750td td20-60td td8-22td tr tr tdPE500×750td td500×750td td50-100td td45-100td tr tr tdPE600×900td td600×900td td65-160td td70-120td tr tr tdPE750×1060td td750×1060td td80-140td td130-260td tr tr tdPE900×1200td td900×1200td td95-165td td220-380td tr tr tdPE1000×1200td td1000×1200td td195-265td td230-380td tr tr tdPE1200×1500td td1200×1500td td150-300td td400-800td tr tbodytable applicationJaw crusher is widely used in various mining &construction materials processing industries such as granite marble basalt limestone quartz cobble iron ore copper ore and some other mineral &rocks.
products.lm: name;LM Vertical Grinding Mills; overview SBM success in absorbing foreign experience and producing our vertical grinding mill. Now it has wide application in metallurgy construction chemical and mining industries being the preferred equipments in grinding industry. feature[Low operation cost and long service lifeExcellent drying functionGood final products qualityEnvironmentally friendly technical technical applicationLM series vertical grinding mills are widely used in grinding non-flammable and non-explosive materials under 9.3(the Mohs hardness) such as grinding quartz feldspar calcite etc
products.magnetic: name;Magnetic Separator; overview Magnetic separator is one of the most important sperating machine in mineral beneficiation industry. Due to the physical-property difference magnetic separator include many kinds models such as high intensity separator low intensity separator and some other models. feature[High capacity &Excellent performanceEasily installed &Extremely easy to cleanSimple structure &Saving downtimeKey parts are well prevent from being corroded through optimized design technical technical applicationMagnetic separator is suitable for wet separating of magnetite magnetic pyrite baking ore and limonite etc.It also can be used for removing Fe procession of coal nonmetallic mineral and construction materials
products.mtm: name;MTM Medium Speed Trapezium Grinder; overview MTM Medium Speed Trapezium grinder is a kind of leading-world-level industrial milling machinery designed according to many years’ research and the world-leading-powder processing technology. feature[technical  improvement based on environmental protection concept..High efficient and energy saving centrifugal draft fan.High density and precision impeller device.Quick adjustment and maintenance technical technical applicationMTM series grinding mill is widely used in electric power industry metallurgy industry chemical industry building construction coal industry fireproofing materials making industry and some others
products.mtw: name;MTW Series Milling Machine; overview This MTW series milling machine is designed by our experts according to collected advices from customers long-term experiences. It takes the most advanced patent technology from European and the supply the customers with outstanding performance at low costs. feature[Convenient installation& low dissipation of energy.Higher main-spring pressurization larger capacityHigh-performance powder concentrator design-accurate and quick selection of powder.Convenient for maintenance and replacing parts saving the downtime technical technical applicationThe MTW series milling machine has wide application in powder making industry of construction mining and paper-making and so on. It is the ideal machine for grinding barite limestone mica talcum etc.
products.raymond: name;Raymond Mill; overview The Raymond grinding mill was ever popular in mining building materials chemical engineering and metallurgy industries for size reduction dispersion，etc. Now it is replaced by SBM new style mills like MTM MTW series grinding mills. feature[Take little working spacesClosed system and steady performance Durable and long service lifeIt can be controlled intensively and high automation technical technical applicationRaymond mill was designed to grind non-flammable and non-explosive materials. It ever is the mainstream grinding machine in powder making industry.
products.rubber: name;Rubber-tyred series Mobile Crusher; overview According to customers’ requirements of improving crushing plants mobility SBM developed Rubber-tyred series Mobile Crusher. It contains many types models such as mobile jaw crushing plant mobile impact crushing plant and mobile cone crushing plant etc. feature[Meet high demands for mobility both on site and on the roadGreatly reduce Material Transportation costEasy to combine with other plantsExcellent adaptability to environment technical technical applicationRubber-tyred series Mobile Crushers are used in great many fields that have great requirements of plants’ mobility such as river aggregates processing construction waste recycling road &bridge construction and mining industries and so on.
products.sand: name;Sand making machine; overview Sand making machine can also be called vertical shaft impact crusher it is the indispensable machine in manufactured sand production &truing. SBM developed series of sand making crusher like VSI sand making machine and VSI5X sand making machine. feature[Perfect final products shape greatly improve the sand grade increasing the additional valueLarge handling capacity &Adjustable feedstock modes modesCrushing cavity is optimized greatly reduce the operating-costs &the abrade of wear-partsEasy to operate &maintain with the hydraulic system technical table classdataintable tbodytr td rowspan2  Modeltd td  Feed at center&sidestd td  Feed at centertd td  Soft Materialtd td  Hard Materialtd tr tr td colspan2 Capacity(th)td td colspan2 Max.Feeding(mm)td tr tr td VSI7611td td 120-180td td 60-90td td 35td td 30td tr tr td VSI8518td td 200-260td td 100-130td td 40td td 35td tr tr td VSI9526td td 300-380td td 150-190td td 45td td 40td tr tr td VSI1140td td 450-520td td 225-260td td 50td td 45td tr tbodytable applicationSand making machine is the indispensable machine in sand making industry and it is also the most ideal truing machine for mining and construction industries.
products.scm: name;SCM Series Ultrafine Mill; overview SCM series ultrafine mill is specially designed for super fine powder grindingsuch as 325-2500 mesh. Now its growing more and more popular with its reliable technology and perfect after-sale services. feature[High Output and low energy consumptionHigh fineness and flexible adjustmentSafe and ReliableClean and environmental friendly technical technical applicationSCM Super-micro mill is mainly used to produce fine powder and super fine powder. It is applicable to non-flammable and non-explosive materials with hardness less than 6 such as calcite chalk limestone etc.
products.screen: name;Vibrating Screen; overview The vibrating screen is sieving equipment used in numerous industries such as mining construction mineral beneficiation chemical metallurgy etc. With the vibrating screen operators can separate products into different specifications. feature[Strong violent vibrating force & High screening efficiencySmall vibrating noises &Firm and durable constructionConvenient maintenance &Safe operationIt is customizable for special industries technical technical applicationVibrating Screen is used for grading and screening materials in the following fields minerals quarry building materials water conservancy and hydropower transportation chemical industry smelting and so on.
products.spiral: name;Spiral Classifier; overview Spiral classifiers are designed to provide the most effective pool area and overflow velocity requirements. Actually the spiral classifier is not only able to clean the ground mineral ore but also separate the particles briefly. feature[Energy savingHeavy duty rugged constructionPowerful self-contained spiral lifting deviceContinuous spiral raking technical technical applicationSpiral Classifiers are usually suitable for separating fine particles &liquid from coarse particles separating light particles from heavy particles and grading particles according to their sizes
products.t130x: name;T130X Reinforced Ultrafine Mill; overview T130X reinforced ultrafine mill is a new facility designed basing on statistical analysis&a large number of suggestions from users. It well meet the requirements of producing 200-33μm（80-425Mesh）powder. feature[Less vibrating &Reliable performanceApplying high-density blade classifier &Equipping frequency control system.Applying dust bypass collector it wont bring environment pollution.Easy to collect powder &Packing powder technical technical applicationT130X reinforced ultrafine mill is used in processing materials of metallurgy building construction chemicals and mining industry such as feldspar calcite talc etc.
products.washing: name;Sand Washing Machine; overview Sand washing machine can also be called sand washer. They are designed& produced to clean sand particles and improve the quality or grade of particles. SBM ‘s XSD series sand washing machine and LSX series sand washing machine fully satisfy the marketing demands. feature[High capacity and less of fine products &High washing-cleanlinessEasy to operate & Easy to maintain for its simple structureTransmission bearings depart from water and material avoiding being erodedLow investment costs and operating-costs technical technical applicationSand washer is designed to clean natural-sand & artificial-sand improving the quality of sand. But now it is also widely used in cleaning glass chemical materials and some other materials that need to be cleaned in industrial production.

projects.algeria: type:project, introduction:In 2010, the customer contacts with the sales in SBM headquarter, stating that they need to set up a big limestone crushing line. Their requirements are as follows:br Material: Limestone br Max. Size of the material：800mm br Final products sizes：0-3mm，3-8mm，8-15mm，15-25mm，0-25mmbr Capacity：200-250TPH  , flow:According to the customers requirements, our sales contacts with our engineer in SBM headquarter immediately. We advise the customer to install Vibrating Feeder, Jaw Crusher, Impact Crusher, Vibrating Screen and Belt Conveyor. The customer agrees with all the design and signed the contract with us. We sent our technician to help the installation of the crushing line. Now the whole crushing line is in a very good state and this wins high praise from the customer.
projects.barite: type:material, introduction:Baryte, or barite, is a mineral consisting of barium sulfate. Baryte itself is generally white or colorless, and is the main source of barium. Shibang can supply you baryte crusher or barite crusher in barite mining industry., flow:First, the barite will be evenly entered the coarse crushing machine for primary crushing. And then the coarse barite will be entered the Impact Crusher by Belt Conveyor for secondary crushing. And the fine stone materials will be entered the Vibrating Screen to produce various stone specification. And particle size which have not satisfied the requirements will receive the repeated crushing.
projects.basalt: type:material, introduction:Basalt is the ideal materials to mix asphalt mixture. Basalt is largely applied to constructions of railway, highway, and airfield runway. To one complete basalt production line,it may contain many processing machines., flow:The basalt stones of various sizes are fed into the jaw crushers for size reduction. Next, depending on the desired output size of the crushed stone, the raw material may be fed to one or two jaw crushers in a sequence. Then these crushed stones re passed on to the rotary screen for size gradation. Last, material is handled through a belt conveyor to the different places of operation i.e from jaw crusher to the rotary screen.
projects.bauxite: type:material, introduction:Bauxite mine is a kind of ore minerals collectively formed mainly by gibbsite. Bauxite is widely applied in both metal field and nonmetal field. In nonmetal field, bauxite is mainly used as refractories, abrasives, and the raw materials for high alumina cement., flow:Large raw bauxite are fed to Jaw Crusher evenly and gradually by Vibrating Feeder through a hopper for primary crushing. After first step, the material will be transferred to Impact Crusher by Belt Conveyor for secondary crushing; the crushed bauxite stone will be transferred to Vibrating Screen for separating. The parts that meet standard will be transferred away as final products, while the other parts will be returned to Impact Crusher.
projects.belguim: type:project, introduction:A material supplier from Belgium would like to produce limestone powder for his customer, one paper making company. The capacity of the milling plant should be able to reach 3-5 tons per hour, and the final powder size should be as D90105μm. , flow:Since the client just needs medium output size, our MTM Medium Speed Trapezium Mill will be suitable for him. Under guidance of our engineer, they have finished the installation and commissioning. The classifier is adjusted for required size and the capacity has reach to more than 4th.
projects.calcite: type:material, introduction:SBM Machinery is professional manufacturer which can supply all kinds calcite crushing and grinding equipment and design calcite production line according to the requirements of customers., flow:Raw calcite first enter calcite crushing plant to be crushed to smaller size. Then they are lifted to storage room by elevator. Vibrating feeder will feed materials into calcite grinding mill evenly and gradually. After being grinded, the calcite powder will be blowed to cyclone by blower. Then the calcite powder will be transferred to storage room through pipes, and then will be discharged as final products.
projects.carbon: type:material, introduction:The micro ground calcium carbonate powder plays an important role in many industries from agriculture to light and heavy industries. We can manufacture and install complete grinding line for obtaining micro Calcite powder making., flow:When the large calcium carbonate is fed into Ball Mill, it will be ground and the grain size is between 0.074mm and 0.4mm. Then the ground materials will be collected and transferred to MTM Trapezium Mill or MTW Trapezium Mill for further grinding. Then the grain size will meet most of the application. But for some extreme application, the grain size of 0.04mm is still larger, the ultrafine mill can grind the grain size into particles between 325 meshes to 2500 mesh.
projects.chile: type:project, introduction:In 2011, the clients contacted our sales person in Chile branch office. The clients wanted to set up a copper ore crushing plant with the following requirements:brMaterial: copper ore brMax. feed size: 900mmbrFinal product size: 0-6mmbrCapacity: 100-120tph , flow:Our sales person paid a visit to our clients immediately after receiving their inquiry about the running condition of their current production line. After discussion, we suggest  them to use the following equipments: Vibrating Feeder, Jaw Crusher, CS series Cone Crusher, Vibrating Screen and Belt Conveyors. SBM’s professional approach has convinced the clients on our design. We provided our clients with a high rate of return on investment.
projects.clay: type:material, introduction:Clay mine’s crushing and grinding is extremely important in the whole clay mining processing plant. With the ability to maximize product output, our clay processing equipment features high production rates, low operating costs and simplified state of the art mainframe. , flow:For most applications, clays are processed by mechanical methods, such as crushing, grinding, and screening, that do not appreciably alter the chemical or mineralogical properties of the material. However, because clays are used in such a wide range of applications, it is often necessary to use other mechanical and chemical processes, such as drying, calcining, bleaching, blunging, and extruding to prepare the material for use.
projects.coal: type:material, introduction:SBM Machinery is a specialist manufacturer of Coal beneficiation plant. It supplies a variety crusher equipments and also design complete pair of Coal beneficiation plant in line with the requirements of consumers., flow:About Coal Beneficiation, there are three kinds of processes may be performed at the plants: br  (1) Sizing, controlled by a crushing and screening process.br  (2)Increasing heating value, by removing noncombustible ash and rock by gravity separation.br Removing or controlling undesirable mineral and chemical components by a combination of gravity separation and blending.
projects.copper: type:material, introduction:Copper ore is an ore which can produce copper metal by crushing in ore crushing plant, grinding in Ball mill and smelting in a furnace along with a piece of tin ore. SBM is a professional manufacturer of copper ore processing equipment.flow:First the copper ore is transported into the primary crusher which reduces the ores to 8 inches or smaller. After crushing process, the copper ore is send to ball mill for grinding to about 0.2 mm with 3-inch steel balls. This copper ore slurry is finally pumped to the flotation deck. This copper ore slurry is finally pumped to the flotation deck with the fine sulfide ore (~-0.5 mm) going to froth flotation cells for recovery of copper.
projects.dolomite: type:material, introduction:Dolomite is kind of carbonate mineral which includes iron dolomite and manganese dolomite. Calcined dolomite can be processed to make dolomitic limestone which is of good White, strong adhesion, coagulation power, Fire-resistant, heat insulation., flow:Big Dolomite materials are fed to Jaw Crusher evenly and gradually by Vibrating Feeder for primary crushing. After first step, the material will transferred to Impact Crusher by Belt Conveyor for secondary crushing. The crushed dolomite materials will be transferred to Vibrating Screen for separating. After separating, the parts that can meet standard will be transferred away as final products, while the other parts will be returned to impact crusher.
projects.feldspar: type:material, introduction:Feldspar is the most common ore in the earth crust and it even appears on the moon and in the aerolite. Feldspar is the main component of igneous and is also common in metamorphic rock and sedimentary rock. , flow:The process of feldspar crushing is consisted of primary crushing and secondary crushing. After the two stages of feldspar crushing, large feldspar whose diameter is approximately 1.5 meters has changed into feldspar particle, and the size of feldspar particles can achieve to 25mm or less. In the grinding process, crushed feldspar particles is grinded into powder with the fineness requirement of 200 mesh by grinding mill.
projects.gold: type:material, introduction:The gold ore processing plant alternates between treating ore from the mine open pit and from the underground mine. SBM Machinery is one of world leading suppliers of complete gold ore concentration plant., flow:Broken process is generally used to provide the right from the feed mill. Crushing process is the mostly small-scale plant using the process. Sections broken process is the basic form of the process open and three sections of three sections of a closed two. When the feeding of the mud (-3mm) of more than 5% to 10% and water content greater than 5% to 8%, should add the washing operation in the crushing process.
projects.granite: type:material, introduction:Granite is the hardest ore in all minerals, especially broken granite, it can be used in various fields. SBM Mining Machinery provides granite crushing machine, and our product plays an important role in the mining of granite. , flow: Big granite materials are fed to Jaw Crusher evenly and gradually by Vibrating Feeder through a hopper for primary crushing. After first step, the material will be transferred to Cone Crusher by belt conveyor for secondary crushing; the crushed granite materials will then transferred to Vibrating Screen for separating. After separating, the parts that can meet standard will be transferred away as final products, while the other parts will be returned to cone crusher.
projects.gypsum: type:material, introduction:Gypsum is a very useful processed material. Raw gypsum ore is processed into a variety of products such as a portland cement additive, soil conditioner, industrial and building plasters and gypsum wallboard, etc., flow:After being shipped from the mining site, the raw gypsum mine should be first through the Vibrating Feeder to Jaw Crusher, the raw gypsum is fed and crushed to less than 8cm. Then through the secondary step, the mineral is crushed to less than 2cm. The end products will be transported to calcining kiln through bucket elevator. We can change the temperature of the calcining kiln to produce β-type hemihydrate gypsum, anhydrite and over gypsum.
projects.india: type:project, introduction:Early of 2009, one customer from India told us that he was working in one mining company and his boss had one milling plant made up of Raymond Mill and one primary 16×10 Jaw Crusher, but the final products can not meet their demand. They hoped that the final product size should be reach 5-10 micron and the capacity should be about 1tons per hour.  , flow:According to the customers requirement, our engineer suggest them adopting SBM SCM221 Ultrafine mill. Raw materials of 12-14 size are firstly crushed by the clients Jaw Crusher down to 2 and then enter into our Hammer Crusher PC400×300. Crushed to less than 0.4, the materials will be fed to the SCM221 milling machine. When powders discharged from the milling machine, they meet customers’ requirements well. The mill was installed since 2009 and it is running perfect in India now.
projects.indonesia: type:project, introduction:The year before last year, one customer from Bandung, Indonesia planned to build one andesite stone crushing plant and the requirements are generally as follows: The max feeding size should be about 400mm.brThe output size were three kinds: 0-10,10-20,20-30mm. brThe capacity of the plant should reach 50-70TPH (tons per hour). , flow:When we got the customers demands and known all details, we suggested him using Hydraulic Hammer break big rocks to small one firstly and then feed them to the crushing plant that consist of Jaw Crusher, Cone Crusher, Vibrating Feeder, Vibrating Screen and Belt Conveyors. Now the customer have used the machines for one and a half year, the machines running very well.
projects.iran: type:project, introduction:The customers contacted the professional sales man of SBM. He is planning to start a limestone brrushing plant, and the requirements are as follows:brRaw material: limestone, granite brMax. feeding size: 250mmbrOutput size: 0-10mmbrCapacity: 40-50 TPH , flow: According to the customers requirements, our sales man discussed and confirmed the design with senior engineers in the first time. The technicians we sent to Iran spent one month finishing the installation and test of the crush plant and training the local workers of the operation of machines. Now that crush plant is working very well.
projects.iron: type:material, introduction:The iron contains impurities of phosphorus, sulphur and high alkali as well as impregnations of waste rock. To produce a metallurgy treatable concentrate the ore has to be grind for mineral liberation, enriched for concentration and dewatered for transportation., flow:Almost all of the iron ore that is mined is used for making steel. So we need the extraction of a pure metal from its ore. The method used depending upon chemical properties and nature of the ore from which it is to be extracted. It involves four main steps, namely crushing and grinding, concentration or dressing, reduction, and purification or refining.
projects.kaolin: type:material, introduction:Kaolin is one of the most common minerals. Kaolin powder is used in ceramics, medicine, coated paper, toothpaste, as a light diffusing material in white incandescent light bulbs, and in cosmetics. It is generally the main component in porcelain., flow:Wet process concludes mineral preparation, mineral dressing and processing, products processing three stages. Dry process is mainly crushing the mined raw ore to around 25mm, then the ore goes into Cone Crusher for further crushing in order to make the size reach to around 6mm. The crushed ore will have a further grinding process by Raymond Mill which is equipped with centrifugal separator and cyclone dust extractor.
projects.kazakhstan: type:project, introduction:In December, 2008, IDCO group Co., Ltd and the Ministry of Infrastructure of Kazakhstan signed a contract to mine tungsten in eastern Kazakhstan. The project is the largest contract projects received by Chinese company from Kazakhstan and is of great significance to the promotion of cooperation between China and Kazakhstan. , flow:When the project leader consulted with us and introduced the problems, we set up one specialist sub-group and discussed how to solve all problems. At last, the leader and our engineer found the best solution that fit for their requirements. In the crushing process, we adopted Jaw Crusher, Cone Crushers and in the grinding process, we adopted Ball Mill.
projects.limestone: type:material, introduction:Limestone often contains variable amounts of silica or siliceous skeletal fragment, as well as varying amounts of clay, silt and sand sized terrestrial detritus carried in by rivers., flow:The first step of the process is a primary cutting or shaping of the material. A secondary shaping step may be necessary if the product includes any features or custom size or shape. Once a product is completed, it is packaged and stored for shipment or direct sale. Limestone of insufficient quality or size for current demand is stocked on-site for future use, crushed for use in paving and construction applications, or stored for site reclamation activities.
projects.mali: type:project, introduction:A trading company contact with our Beijing branch office.Our salesmen there offered a proposal according to the clients requirements: br Raw material:limestonebr Max. Feeding size:500mmbr Final product size:0-6mm,6-10mm,10-14mmbr Capacity:50-60 TPH , flow:Branch office get contact with SBM senior engineer and made the design of project. We proposed the following equipments to our client: Vibrating Feeder, Jaw Crusher, Impact Crusher, Vibrating Screen and Belt Conveyor. Our engineer spent one month on installation and test run of the whole crushing plant. Now the crushing plant is working with good performance.
projects.manganese: type:material, introduction:Manganese is essential to iron and steel production by virtue of its sulfur-fixing, deoxidizing, and alloying properties. Among a variety of other uses, manganese is a key component of low-cost stainless steel formulations. , flow:The manganese testing is the first step of mining manganese. After manganese tested is manganese mechanical separation, which includes ore crushing, washing, screening, gravity separation, high-intensity magnetic separation and flotation separation, pyrometallurgy enrichment and chemical mineral processing method and so on.
projects.nigeria: type:project, introduction:One Nigeria customer want to produce granite-aggregates for road construction, concrete and asphalt industry. He just has one 24×36Jaw Crusher and two 12×51 finer Jaw Crusher, but the required size in local market is 0~316 (stone dust), 316~12, 12~34 and 34~1 Also, the capacity of existing plant is only 60~70 tons per hour, it was far from the customer’s requirements. , flow:We consulted the customers new requirements and draft one design for him. The new design consists a primary (900×1200mm) 36×48 Jaw Crusher, one secondary S51 Cone Crusher and one S51 Cone Crusher in the tertiary section. With the three stages crushing process, the final products are easy to meet the requirements and the capacity is able to reach 200-250 tons per hour.
projects.panama: type:project, introduction:In 2011, the customer got contact sales person in Shanghai head office, inquiring about a crushing plant for pebble and basalt, and a mobile crusher station. brThe requirements is as follows:brRaw material: pebble, basalt brMax feeding size: 800mmbrOutput size: 0-13mm, 13-20mm, 20-40mm brCapacity: 200-250TPH , flow:It is the second time the customer bought our Mobile Crusher Station. Based on the customer’s requirement, our sales person suggested him the Tyre-type Mobile Crusher Station. Finally, our customer agreed with this plan and concluded the business. Now, this plant runs very well and we have won good reputation from the customer. Recently, the customer bought the third Mobile Crusher Station from our company.
projects.recycle: type:material, introduction:SBM crushing machine are usually used to crush concrete, glass, porcelain, marble, granite, bricks, blocks, asphalt and reinforced concrete. Recycling concrete &building rubble is not only able to bring profit to investors, but also good for environment protection., flow:Construction wastes are firstly be transported to the crushing plant by trucks or by excavators. Then Jaw Crusher crush big lumps to small ones. When the crushed lumps discharged from jaw crusher, the secondary crusher will crush them again until they meet the requirements.
projects.river: type:material, introduction:River stones are mainly river red stones or materials. River stone crushing plant is the major crushing unit to process river stones like cobble rocks, pebble, sand & gravel, silica etc. It calls for crushing, screening and washing process., flow:At the plant, raw river stone will be fed into Jaw Crusher for primary crushing by Vibrating Feeder. Then, the material will be transferred to Impact Crusher for secondary crushing. Then the screening process will begin. The vibrating screen is a key equipment to sieve the crushed stones into different grades. The crushed stone meet the demands will be transported to the stockpile, the other will be sent to cone crusher or impact crusher for fineness crushing.
projects.sand: type:material, introduction:Sand is widely used in road construction, real estate development, concrete making etc. With the rapid development of construction industry, the amount of the natural sand failed to keep pace with the various sectors of modern world development needs., flow:The raw material is transferred to jaw crusher for primary crushing by vibrating feeder, then the crushed materials whose size is larger than 40 mm are transferred to VSI crusher through belt conveyor for secondary crushing. The materials crushed will be transferred to the vibrating screen. The materials with suitable size will be transferred to VSI crusher, after being washed by sand washers, then clean final products will be discharged.
projects.silica: type:material, introduction:Silica is the most abundant mineral found in the crust of the earth. With local teams of application engineers and technology specialists, SBM is dedicated to supporting its technology and providing the design-in expertise for customers to compete successfully., flow:In the silica powder making process, Jaw Crusher is used as primary crushing machine.The sand particles that meet the requirements enter into the VSI Sand Making Machine for making fine sand, while the others enter into the tertiary crushing plant for fine crushing, then go for sand making. The fine sand from the sand making machine must be washed by sand washer. Then we need silica sand milling machine, it can grind silica sand into powder.
projects.silver: type:material, introduction:Silver is a soft, white, lustrous transition metal, it has the highest electrical conductivity of any element and the highest thermal conductivity of any metal. SBM crushers have a very important role in silver ores mining, especially in silver ores’ crushing process., flow:Silver is commonly extracted from ore by crushing, grinding, smelting or chemical leaching. Jaw Crusher is commonly used as the primary crusher and Impact Crusher, Cone Crusher are used as secondary crusher. The Ball Mill, Raymond Mill or High Pressure Mill is often used as grinding machine to grind silver ores to final size. The crushed silver ores will be smelted to get the final product – silver.
projects.sirilanka: type:project, introduction:The customer started contact with SBM in 2011 and said they would like to set up a granite crushing plant in Sri Lanka in 2011 urgently.brRaw material: granitebrMax. Feeding size: 500-600mmbrOutput size: 0-6mm,6-12mm,12-19mm,19-37.5mmbrCapacity: 120-150tph, flow:As per their specification requirements and the original unflat ground drawings, we designed a perfect flow chart to meet their request very well. SBM sent out one or two engineers to their work site to help them installing, commissioning as well as training their employees how to operate and so on. Nowadays the crushing plant is working very well.
projects.talc: type:material, introduction:Talc is a common metamorphic mineral in metamorphic belts which contain ultramafic rocks. Talc powder is widely used in agriculture and food, ceramics, coating, paper, personal care, plastic, rubber, wastewater treatment industries., flow:Talc rock is mined by giant shovels. The different ore types are sorted as they are extracted from the seam. The large talc rocks will be fed into crushing plant for small particles. Then the talc ores will be sorted according to their talc content and brightness. From talc rock to talc powder, the talc processing plant involves crushing, washing, sorting, analysis, milling (grinding, pulverizing) and packing etc.
projects.uae: type:project, introduction:A quarry operator in the UAE needed to expand their crushing and screening plant. Though they already have one primary and a secondary crusher, material comes out from the secondary crusher are mostly above 20mm. While, the new demand of customers is 0-5mm; 5-10mm; 10-20mm, the existing plants can not meet the newest requirements well. , flow:After consulting with SBM engineer, they accepted our suggestion and add SBM VSI-7611 Sand Making Machine in the existing plant. This machine was to crush 20-35mm materials to 0-5mm; 5-10mm; 10-20mm directly. After commissioning, both the capacity and the final product quality exactly meet the quarry owners initial plan.
